verses.name: Numbers 24:13
verses.text: If Balak would give me his house full of silver and gold, I cannot go beyond the commandment of the Lord, to do either good or bad of mine own mind; but what the Lord saith, that will I speak?

verses.name: Numbers 24:14
verses.text: And now, behold, I go unto my people: come therefore, and I will advertise thee what this people shall do to thy people in the latter days.

verses.name: Numbers 24:15
verses.text: And he took up his parable, and said, Balaam the son of Beor hath said, and the man whose eyes are open hath said:
